Name: Single Page App
Description:
The Single Page App is a demonstration for a simple mos. app. The following features were used:

 - Navigation Bar Layout
 - Layered View
 - Template
 - Text Layer
 - Image Layer
 - Asset
 - Translations
 - Conditional Styles (for dark mode)

Name: Blog App
Description:
The Fabrik19 Blog App demonstrates basic features of mos:

 - Tabs
 - Database and Queries
 - External Datasource
 - Lists
 - Detail Views
 - Layer Styles
 - Actions
 - Assets
 - Translations

Name: Gas Station App
Description:
Gas Station App is a public showcase project built using the mos. technology.
It demonstrates the technology's ability to build real-world, data-driven mobile applications.

The app allows users to:

  - Search for gas stations in Germany based on provided location and range
  - View a sortable list of matching stations with up-to-date fuel prices
  - Display the search results on an interactive in-app map
  - Launch navigation to a selected gas station via Google Maps or Apple Maps
